job_title: Python Developer -Basking Ridge, NJ or Irving, TX(ONSITE)
jd: Hi,This is Shanu Francis from Parmesoft. We have an immediate opening for Python Developer -Basking Ridge, NJ or Irving, TX(ONSITE)with my client. So, Please have a look on the Job Description below and reply me back if you are interested.Position: Python Developer -Basking Ridge, NJ or Irving, TX(ONSITE)Location: Basking Ridge, NJ or Irving, TX(ONSITE)Long term ContractJob Description: with Verizon experience Required-Able to write python script for automation (writing small programs that automate repetitive tasks)-Able to deploy script on onprem /Cloud server-Able to execute /test Python script in citrix environment-Able to embed and trigger python script on a web page (react)
